metadata.name: I see more Rewards for You in the Future
metadata.description:
Complimentary Airdrop to all bidders in the initial auction of "What does the Future hodl?" on SuperRare (https://superrare.com/0xa56fa216629b04376b03163b9461818c8f8b9c64/what-does-the-future-hodl-82) as a token of appreciation.

The edition size of this NFT will be determined by the number of bidders + 1 for the artist herself.

For more artworks by me, holder rewards (free claims, etc), see https://lynkfire.com/monika for more collections and creations of my NFT journey since July 2021.

NFT created from a traditional painting using oil chalks on paper, digitally combined with own photo elements | orig round with 13cm in diameter, in December 2022, by Monika | Dimensions 7000x7000px.
